name: Wrong or Right
description:
This game is about identifying what you as the player thinks is Right or Wrong. 

It will introduce you to a few scenarios where only 1 option can be chosen between 2.

My aim is to present the idea of there is no right and wrong in life, most importantly, not to ignore the fact that every option you THINK it is Right / Wrong, there is always a down/upside to it.

Please feel free to comment and give me any advice. 

Thank you very much.
